alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 10 at 3:03AM MDT until April 10 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier National Park and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 9 AM MDT this morning. For the High Wind Watch, from late tonight through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains
